BlackStorm::

"But I heard that Prime had been reprogrmated and now he's willing to 
destroy us and Hydras is Megatron and Galvatro at the same time. isn 
he?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Before Maxima could reply to Blackstorm she turned her optics back 
to 
> Sideways. The look on her face was none to sweet. "Optimus Prime 
ceased to function 
> many eons ago." pausing. "Megatron no longer exists." she stated 
with some 
> emotion in her voice, that of pain of the loss & anger. Eventhough 
Hydras now was 
> a combination of Megatron & Galvatron... it was of the recent 
Megatron whom 
> Maxima never met. Galvatron.. she didn't know if this was the same 
Galvatron she 
> knew. 
> 
> "Your journey here has been a waste my friend." She smirked 
weakly. "Unless 
> you wish too assist us?"
